examples.example: 妈妈在市场买了一把青蒜，准备回家做美味的菜肴。

translate.english: Mother bought a bunch of green garlic in the market and is ready to go home to make delicious dishes.

examples.example: 我用青蒜炒了一盘香喷喷的肉丝，大家都吃得很开心。

translate.english: I stir-fried a plate of fragrant shredded meat with green garlic, and everyone ate very happily.

examples.example: 今天妈妈用青蒜做了一道色香味俱佳的青蒜炒鸡蛋，真是太美味了。

translate.english: Today, mother made a delicious stir-fried egg with green garlic which has excellent color, aroma and taste. It is really so delicious.
